definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Strawberry, blackcurrant, litchi and mango are some popular flavoured yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 草莓，黑醋栗，荔枝和芒果是一些受歡迎風味的酸奶。

sentences.english: Daeji Gal-bi is the choice pork ribs specially hand filleted, marinated in the sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 醃製在甜醬油裏的豬肉，喫起來又有另一番風味。

sentences.english: Let's have something with a local flavor .
sentences.chinese: 咱們來喫點有地方風味的東西。

sentences.english: The exhibition of folk customs includes an attractive display of local foods.
sentences.chinese: 家鄉風味食品在這屆民俗民風展覽會上引衆人注目。

sentences.english: Classic German-style flavor, a perfect cherry and strawberry cake.
sentences.chinese: 徳式傳統經典風味，酒釀櫻桃的完美呈現。

sentences.english: Among them steaming and stir-fryingare more commonly applied to preserve the natural flavor.
sentences.chinese: 箇中蒸和炒最常用於保存天然風味。

sentences.english: Watery town Wuzhen near Jiaxing, Zhejiang is very typical of Jiangnan taste.
sentences.chinese: 浙江嘉興附近的烏鎮，具有濃烈的水鄉風味。

sentences.english: Our restaurant caters (for) high grade feasts and local-flavour snacks of south China.
sentences.chinese: 本店承辦高檔宴席和南方風味小喫。

sentences.english: Tofu and mushrooms have their own unique flavours.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐和蘑菇有自己獨特的風味。

sentences.english: Cantonese sausage is well known for its particular appearance and flavor.
sentences.chinese: 廣式臘腸以其獨特的外觀和風味聞名遐邇。

sentences.english: Hebei Province in 1980 was named high-quality brand-name flavor of food.
sentences.chinese: 1980年又被評爲河北省優質風味食品名牌產品。

sentences.english: The piano has a quaint old-world tone about it.
sentences.chinese: 這架鋼琴的音色具有一種古雅的老式風味。

sentences.english: With exquisite workmanship, PE celebrated, unique flavor from home or abroad.
sentences.chinese: 益以工藝精湛，風味獨特著稱，飲譽海內外。

sentences.english: Features Xiantian moderate Maotai rich, unique flavor.
sentences.chinese: 特點鹹甜適中，醬香濃郁，風味獨特。

sentences.english: Almond tea was introduced by the civil court of a snack.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁茶是由宮廷傳入民間的一種風味小喫。

sentences.english: These hydrolysates yielded the meaty flavoring necessary to make these rapid-cooking soups, meaty and so enticing.
sentences.chinese: 這類水解物提供了肉的風味使湯料很誘人。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
